  • Methods
  • Fields 
    Field Description
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.ClientConfiguration.CLIENT_TLS_KEYSTORE
    Use AbstractConfiguration.TLS_KEYSTORE
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.ClientConfiguration.CLIENT_TLS_KEYSTORE_PASSWORD_PATH
    Use AbstractConfiguration.TLS_KEYSTORE_PASSWORD_PATH
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.ClientConfiguration.CLIENT_TLS_KEYSTORE_TYPE
    Use AbstractConfiguration.TLS_KEYSTORE_TYPE
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.ClientConfiguration.CLIENT_TLS_TRUSTSTORE
    Use AbstractConfiguration.TLS_TRUSTSTORE
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.ClientConfiguration.CLIENT_TLS_TRUSTSTORE_PASSWORD_PATH
    Use AbstractConfiguration.TLS_TRUSTSTORE_PASSWORD_PATH
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.ClientConfiguration.CLIENT_TLS_TRUSTSTORE_TYPE
    Use AbstractConfiguration.TLS_TRUSTSTORE_TYPE
  • Methods 
    Method Description
    org.apache.bookkeeper.client.BookKeeper.Builder.setEventLoopGroup​(EventLoopGroup)
    since 4.5, use BookKeeper.Builder.eventLoopGroup(EventLoopGroup)
    org.apache.bookkeeper.client.BookKeeper.Builder.setStatsLogger​(StatsLogger)
    since 4.5, use BookKeeper.Builder.statsLogger(StatsLogger)
    org.apache.bookkeeper.client.BookKeeper.Builder.setZookeeper​(ZooKeeper)
    since 4.5, use BookKeeper.Builder.zk(ZooKeeper)
    org.apache.bookkeeper.client.BookKeeper.Builder.zk​(ZooKeeper)
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.AbstractConfiguration.getLedgerManagerType()
    replaced by AbstractConfiguration.getLedgerManagerFactoryClass()
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.AbstractConfiguration.getZkAvailableBookiesPath()
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.AbstractConfiguration.getZkLedgersRootPath()
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.AbstractConfiguration.getZkServers()
    since 4.7.0
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.AbstractConfiguration.setLedgerManagerType​(String)
    replaced by AbstractConfiguration.setLedgerManagerFactoryClass(java.lang.Class<? extends org.apache.bookkeeper.meta.LedgerManagerFactory>)
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.AbstractConfiguration.setZkLedgersRootPath​(String)
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.AbstractConfiguration.setZkServers​(String)
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.ClientConfiguration.getPCBCTimeoutTimerNumTicks()
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.ClientConfiguration.getPCBCTimeoutTimerTickDurationMs()
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.ClientConfiguration.getReadTimeout()
    use ClientConfiguration.getReadEntryTimeout() or ClientConfiguration.getAddEntryTimeout() instead
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.ClientConfiguration.getRegistrationClientClass()
    since 4.7.0
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.ClientConfiguration.getTimeoutTaskIntervalMillis()
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.ClientConfiguration.isNettyUsePooledBuffers()
    see BookKeeperBuilder.allocator(io.netty.buffer.ByteBufAllocator)
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.ClientConfiguration.setNettyUsePooledBuffers​(boolean)
    see BookKeeperBuilder.allocator(io.netty.buffer.ByteBufAllocator)
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.ClientConfiguration.setPCBCTimeoutTimerNumTicks​(int)
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.ClientConfiguration.setPCBCTimeoutTimerTickDurationMs​(long)
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.ClientConfiguration.setReadTimeout​(int)
    use ClientConfiguration.setReadEntryTimeout(int) or ClientConfiguration.setAddEntryTimeout(int) instead
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.ClientConfiguration.setRegistrationClientClass​(Class<? extends RegistrationClient>)
    since 4.7.0
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.ClientConfiguration.setTimeoutTaskIntervalMillis​(long)
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.ServerConfiguration.getCompactionRate()
    replaced by ServerConfiguration.getCompactionRateByEntries()
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.ServerConfiguration.getJournalDirName()
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.ServerConfiguration.getRegistrationManagerClass()
    since 4.7.0, in favor of using AbstractConfiguration.getMetadataServiceUri()
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.ServerConfiguration.setRegistrationManagerClass​(Class<? extends RegistrationManager>)
    since 4.7.0, in favor of using AbstractConfiguration.setMetadataServiceUri(String)
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.ServerConfiguration.setSortedLedgerStorageEnabled​(boolean)
    Use ServerConfiguration.setLedgerStorageClass(String) to configure the implementation class
